trans-unit.source: Starts a cluster node.
trans-unit.target: Starts a cluster node.

trans-unit.source: The source <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.FabricClient.ClusterManagementClient</codeEntityReference> on which this action is invoked.
trans-unit.target: The source <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.FabricClient.ClusterManagementClient</codeEntityReference> on which this action is invoked.

trans-unit.source: The node name of the node to start.
trans-unit.target: The node name of the node to start.

trans-unit.source: The node instance ID of the node, before it was stopped.
trans-unit.target: The node instance ID of the node, before it was stopped.

trans-unit.source: If this is not specified, or is set to 0, this is ignored.
trans-unit.target: If this is not specified, or is set to 0, this is ignored.

trans-unit.source: If this is set to -1, the system will internally determine this value.
trans-unit.target: If this is set to -1, the system will internally determine this value.

trans-unit.source: If set to Verify, the system will check that the node started, and the API will not return until it has.
trans-unit.target: If set to Verify, the system will check that the node started, and the API will not return until it has.

trans-unit.source: If set to DoNotVerify, the API returns once the node start has been initiated.
trans-unit.target: If set to DoNotVerify, the API returns once the node start has been initiated.

trans-unit.source: A task with information representing the target node.
trans-unit.target: A task with information representing the target node.

trans-unit.source: The <codeEntityReference>P:System.Fabric.FabricException.ErrorCode</codeEntityReference> property will indicate the reason.
trans-unit.target: The <codeEntityReference>P:System.Fabric.FabricException.ErrorCode</codeEntityReference> property will indicate the reason.

trans-unit.source: If the ErrorCode is InvalidArgument, nodeName or nodeInstance is invalid.
trans-unit.target: If the ErrorCode is InvalidArgument, nodeName or nodeInstance is invalid.

trans-unit.source: If the ErrorCode is InstanceIdMismatch, the nodeInstance provided does not match the instance of the node that was stopped.
trans-unit.target: If the ErrorCode is InstanceIdMismatch, the nodeInstance provided does not match the instance of the node that was stopped.

trans-unit.source: If the ErrorCode is NodeHasNotStoppedYet, there is a currently pending stop operation on this node.
trans-unit.target: If the ErrorCode is NodeHasNotStoppedYet, there is a currently pending stop operation on this node.

trans-unit.source: The operation timed out.
trans-unit.target: The operation timed out.

trans-unit.source: An argument with a value of null was passed in.
trans-unit.target: An argument with a value of null was passed in.

trans-unit.source: A cluster node is a process, not an virtual or physical machine.
trans-unit.target: A cluster node is a process, not an virtual or physical machine.
